title: Some nice people saying some nice things...

item.name: Jennifer H.
item.title: JenniferHorner.com
item.description: Dan automated the wage report filing and the tax payment steps, which freed up close to 120 hours quarterly and all but eliminated the likelihood of user error.

item.name: Jocelyn K.
item.title: ReadYourWorld.com
item.description: As the contractor with the most influence on my project, Dan has delivered time and time again.

item.name: Jeff W.
item.title: Firefly and Legwork
item.description: In every case, Dan has been quick to understand the business problem and apply creative, situation appropriate solutions with successful outcomes.
